name: Skelly (kitsuma)
description:
Escape the evil necromancer!

Skelly is a 2D action game in which you play a skeleton fighting for their freedom from an evil necromancer!

You must defeat enemies, raising your strength, before finally taking on the necromancer. However, you must be careful, as while your body will reconstruct if you are defeated by a regular enemy... The same cannot be said of the necromancer!

Luckily, you're able to avoid the necromancer while you gain power, as their location will always be shown by an indicator!

Good luck, Skelly!

This game was created in nine days as our first ever game, specifically for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022. We sincerely hope you like it!

Programming by @Grizzlelab

Art by @Chuchuanart

SFX by Kenney
